description: A classic veggie French stew, try this wholesome vegetarian-friendly meal that's packed with vegetables and couscous, and finished with sweet balsamic glaze.
name: Ratatouille Couscous With Balsamic Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return vegetables to pan. Add garlic and tomato, then cook for 1 minute or until garlic is fragrant. Remove from heat. Stir in couscous, basil and parsley. Serve drizzled with balsamic glaze.
